docs.snippet: BALTIMORE, Md., April 22.-- Hundreds of women and children, with a sprinkling of men, cheered Viscountess Astor when she stepped from the train at Mount Royal station this afternoon.

headline.main: ENTER LADY ASTOR AND HALL IS HERS; Women in Baltimore Session Lose Interest in Program When She Appears. SPEAKERS GIVE HER FLOOR Admits She Never Broke Windows in Sufrage Cause, but Thanks Friends Who Did.
